name: Furious Assault

content:
The character’s speed and martial prowess allow him to land
several blows where lesser combatants land one. If the character
successfully hits his target using the All Out Attack Action, he
may spend his Reaction to make an additional attack using the
same bonuses or penalties as the original attack.
